Module com.example.navalbattle
Package com.example.navalbattle.models

Class MatchStatusSerializable

java.lang.Object
com.example.navalbattle.models.MatchStatusSerializable
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchStatusSerializableInterface, Serializable
public class MatchStatusSerializable extends Object implements MatchStatusSerializableInterface, Serializable
Represents the status of a match in the Battleship game, containing the boards for both the player and the machine. This class is serializable, enabling the game state to be saved and loaded, allowing the player to resume from the last saved state.
Author:
Mateo Noguera Pinto
